mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS981B ( SELECT T.DUDT_MNGM_NO AS DUDT_MNGM_NO /* 기일관리번호 */ , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(ERLM_SEQ) FROM IBIMS981B) + ROWNUM(), ROWNUM()) AS ERLM_SEQ /* 등록순번 */ , C.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , T.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , D.DUDT_DPCH_TP_DCD AS DUDT_DPCH_TP_DCD /* 통보 */ , D.CHRR_STFNO AS CHRR_STFNO /* 담당자직원번호 */ , D.SUB_CHRR_STFNO AS SUB_CHRR_STFNO /* 부담당자직원번호 */ , D.MNGM_ORGNO AS MNGM_ORGNO /* 관리조직번호 */ , T.BZ_DD AS ERLM_DT /* 등록일자 */ , T.PRAR_DT AS ACTN_PRAR_DT /* 조치예정일자 */ , T.PRCS_DT AS ACTN_DT /* 조치일자 */ , 'N' AS USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , 'N' AS DPCH_YN /* 통보여부 */ , 'N' AS DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , NOW() AS HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , '' AS HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , '' AS HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , '' AS HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , '' AS GUID /* GUID */ FROM ( SELECT A.PRDT_CD , A.PRAR_DT , A.PRCS_DT , A.PRCS_CPLT_YN , CASE WHEN PRAR_DT < B.BZ_DD AND PRCS_CPLT_YN != 1 THEN '0501' WHEN PRAR_DT = B.DD1AF_BZ_DD AND PRCS_CPLT_YN != 1 THEN '0502' WHEN PRAR_DT = B.DD3AF_BZ_DD AND PRCS_CPLT_YN != 1 THEN '0503' WHEN PRAR_DT < B.BZ_DD AND PRCS_CPLT_YN = 1 THEN '0504' ELSE '' END AS DUDT_MNGM_NO , B.BZ_DD FROM IBIMS403B A, IBIMS999B B WHERE 1=1 ) T LEFT JOIN IBIMS201B C ON T.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD LEFT JOIN IBIMS980B D ON T.DUDT_MNGM_NO = D.DUDT_MNGM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND T.DUDT_MNGM_NO != '' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS981B WHERE 1=1 AND ERLM_DT = ( SELECT BZ_DD FROM IBIMS999B )
